title: That "friendly" Man-Drop indicator
body: Sooo I'm not sure if it's being worked on or fixed at any point soon. But if you've played against {{champion:80}} recently then you'll probably notice that his ultimate's circle indicator is colored as friendly/allied. Just thinking that it should be fixed. Doesn't seem like a big deal but it's confusing a bit...

replies.body: Thanks Meddler! I got rekt by a 'Friendly fire'? Pantheon ult that showed up as green then squashed me like a bug t_t
yea makes it hard to avoid.
